data.title: Buy Duke Basketball Tickets, Prices, Game Dates & Blue Devils Schedule
data.meta_description: Get Duke Blue Devils Basketball Tickets At TicketSmarter Today! Discover The Hottest Courtside Seats And Ticket Prices With Our Seating Chart.
data.text:
Duke Blue Devils Basketball Tickets

As one of the best and nationally ranked college basketball teams, Duke basketball tickets are hard to come by. The Cameron Indoor Arena only has a capacity of 9,000 fans and opened in 1940. The men's basketball team, known as the Blue Devils, is a part of the Duke University athletics department. The University is located in Durham, North Carolina. It was initially founded in 1838 in the town of Trinity before moving to its current location in 1892. As a member of the NCAA Division I Atlantic Coast Conference, the Blue Devils basketball team started playing in 1905. They have won a total of five NCAA Tournament titles and appeared in 11 total national championship games. In total, they made a debut in the NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament 43 times. They join the ranks of the University of Kansas, the University of Kentucky, and The University of North Carolina (UNC) at Chapel Hill as one of the only four teams to have won over 2,000 victories. Their current record is 2176-887. Currently coached by Mike Krzyzewski, also known as Coach K. Become a devil when you secure Duke Basketball tickets.

Duke Blue Devils Basketball Ticket Prices

Because the Cameron Indoor Stadium only has a capacity of 9,291, Blue Devil basketball tickets are hard to come by. They are one of the best college basketball teams in the NCAA, which also increases ticket prices. For cheaper Duke basketball tickets, you will want to purchase tickets for the exhibition games or early in the season. Once conference play starts, tickets skyrocket. A majority of the tickets are reserved for students near the front of the complex.

How much are Duke Blue Devils Basketball tickets?

If you are lucky, you can find Duke Blue Devils Basketball tickets for $50 if they are playing at Madison Square Gardens or another arena. If you discover Duke Basketball tickets, they typically start at $265 per ticket. Don't delay, buy your college basketball tickets today through TicketSmarter.

Fans looking for Duke Blue Devils Basketball tickets for the current basketball season can find them on TicketSmarter for prices starting at $179.10 and going as high as $3240.00. The average ticket prices for a single Duke Blue Devils Basketball game during the current season is around $487.02. Maine Black Bears at Duke Blue Devils Basketball tickets for the game on 11/4/2024 TBA are available on TicketSmarter right now with prices ranging from $346.68 to $770.40. There are 71 tickets listed for the game on TicketSmarter, so grab yours today and make your plans to be at Cameron Indoor Stadium, 115 Whitford Drive, Durham, NC for the matchup.

Duke Blue Devils Basketball Schedule

Duke basketball has one of the best rivalries in all of college basketball. Their opponent is the UNC basketball team. The two teams play each other in the Duke Blue Devils vs. North Carolina Tar Heels rivalry basketball game is always the last game of the season with the home team hosting senior night. They will play each other, usually one additional time during the season as well as the Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC) tournament. The Blue Devils compete in the ACC, where they face off against Boston College, Clemson University, and the University of Miami. One of their 2019 exhibition games was against the Northwest Missouri State University Bearcats men's basketball team; the Bearcats won the 2018 NCAA Division II Men's Basketball Tournament. Secure your spot when you purchase Duke basketball tickets.

The Duke Blue Devils Basketball schedule has 2 basketball games left to be played during the current season. Fans have the State Farm Champions Classic (Kansas Jayhawks vs Michigan State Spartans, Kentucky Wildcats vs Duke Blue Devils) game at State Farm Arena, 1 State Farm Drive, Atlanta, GA marked on their calendars. The basketball game will take place on November 12th, 2024 at 7:00pm and there are 212 ticket listings currently available on TicketSmarter with prices ranging from $179.10 to $3240.00.

When do Duke Blue Devils Basketball tickets go on sale?

Basketball tickets go on sale in early October. For more information, check out TicketSmarter.

Duke Blue Devils Basketball Seating Chart

The Cameron Indoor Stadium is home to the Blue Devils men's and women's basketball teams. The Duke Blue Devils women's volleyball team also participates in sport at the venue. This complex opened in 1940 and was known as the Duke Indoor Stadium. The name changed in 1972 to honor former basketball, football, and athletic director Eddie Cameron. The current capacity is 9,291, though it initially could hold 8,800. The difference between this indoor stadium and other more modern stadiums is the lack of suites or premium seating options. The Cameron Indoor Stadium was built for one reason, basketball. The record loudest crowd came in at 121.3 decibels, which is louder than a chainsaw at a distance of three feet or a standard jackhammer. While there are seats, most of the time, you will be standing at a Duke basketball home game.
